message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $11,500.  It's a great deal for you, as you know it's worth $12,000 to you.  Let me know if you're interested!
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,500. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I'd like to save a bit more if possible.

Bob, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate.  I understand you're looking for a great deal, but $10,500 is still a bit below what I'm hoping for.  How about we split the difference and go with $11,000? This way we both get a good deal. Let me know what you think.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit short on budget. How about we meet at $10,750? I'm willing to go up a bit more, but I really want to stay within my budget.
